channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Dotdash Meredithの組合員、2021年以来の交渉の末、経営陣との契約を批准。
item.description:
Natalie Korach / The Wrap:
Dotdash Meredith unionized workers ratify contracts with management after negotiating since 2021; the deal covers ~160 staffers at People and other magazines  —  The three-year deal covers approximately 160 staffers at People, Entertainment Weekly and Martha Stewart Living

item.title: Apple TV+のマーケティング責任者を16ヶ月務めたリッキー・ストラウスが退社する。
item.description:
Nellie Andreeva / Deadline:
Ricky Strauss, who has been head of marketing at Apple TV+ for 16 months, is leaving; he earlier was president of content and marketing at Disney+ at its launch  —  Ricky Strauss is leaving Apple TV+ after a 16-month stint as Head of Marketing.  —  In his role, he was involved …

item.title: NPRのキャサリン・メーア最高経営責任者（CEO）は、NPRの偏向疑惑を調査する5月8日の米下院委員会の公聴会にスケジュールの都合で出席しないが、後日出席することを申し出た（Austin Fuller/Current
item.description:
Austin Fuller / Current:
NPR CEO Katherine Maher will not attend a US House committee hearing on May 8 looking at alleged NPR bias due to a schedule conflict, but offers to appear later  —  NPR CEO Katherine Maher will not attend a U.S. House committee hearing Wednesday aimed at looking into alleged ideological bias at the organization.

item.title: 高校生の間で人気のある無料音楽ストリーミングアプリ「Musi」を見てみると、YouTubeを使って音楽を調達しているため、Musiはレコード会社から法的措置を受ける可能性がある（Kate Knibbs/Wired）
item.description:
Kate Knibbs / Wired:
A look at Musi, a free music streaming app popular among high schoolers that uses YouTube to source music, opening Musi up to legal action from record labels  —  Musi's free music streaming app is a hit with thrifty teens.  The app claims to tap content on YouTube, but some in the music industry question the legitimacy of that model.

item.title: 調査米国成人の48％がローカルニュースはウェブサイトかソーシャル・メディアを好む。
item.description:
Pew Research Center:
Survey: 48% of US adults prefer websites or social media for local news; 15% paid for local news in the last year; 63% believe local outlets do well financially  —  As news consumption habits become more digital, U.S. adults continue to see value in local outlets  —  Table of Contents Table of Contents

item.title: ピューリッツァー賞の受賞者を歴史的に見ると、地方紙や地域紙の衰退と、特に地方レベルでのオンライン・ニュースの成長が見られる（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
A historical look at Pulitzer winners shows the decline of local and regional newspapers and the growth in online news outlets, especially at the local level  —  For the first time ever, more online news sites produced Pulitzer finalists than newspapers did.

item.title: MetaがAI広告ツールのアップデートを発表、背景だけでなく完全な新規画像を作成できるようになり、悪用を防ぐために強力なガードレールを追加したと主張（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Meta announces an update to its AI ad tools, which can now make full new images, not just backgrounds, and claims it's adding strong guardrails to prevent abuse  —  Meta is rolling out an expanded set of generative AI tools for advertisers, after first announcing a set of AI features last October.

item.title: Reddit第1四半期：売上高は前年同期比48%増の$243M、予想$212.8M、純損失はIPO費用に牽引され$575.1M、DAUq合計は37%増の82.7M、RDDTは時間外で15%以上上昇（Ashley Capoot/CNBC）
item.description:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
Reddit Q1: revenue up 48% YoY to $243M, vs. $212.8M est., net loss of $575.1M, driven by IPO expenses, and DAUq total up 37% to 82.7M; RDDT up 15%+ after hours  —  Reddit CEO Steve Huffman hugs mascot Snoo as Reddit begins trading on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York on March 21, 2024.

item.title: 2015年に設立され、2024年のピューリッツァー賞2部門を受賞した約10人のジャーナリストを擁する非営利ニュースルーム、シカゴのインビジブル・インスティテュートの様子（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
A look at Chicago's Invisible Institute, a nonprofit newsroom with about a dozen journalists incorporated in 2015 that won two 2024 Pulitzers  —  The Invisible Institute, a nonprofit newsroom with roughly a dozen journalists, was recognized for local and audio reporting.

item.title: TikTok、売却または禁止を強制する法律をめぐり米政府を提訴、ユーザーの憲法修正第1条の権利を侵害し、分割は「単純に不可能」（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
TikTok sues the US government over the law forcing a sale or ban, saying it violates users' First Amendment rights and divestiture is “simply not possible”  —  The social media company and its Chinese parent, ByteDance, sued to challenge the new law, saying it violated users' First Amendment rights.

item.title: OpenAIは、2025年までにリリースを予定しているMedia Managerツールを開発中で、コンテンツ所有者がOpenAIに作品を識別させ、その使用方法をコントロールできるようにすると述べている（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
OpenAI says it's developing a Media Manager tool, slated for release by 2025, to let content owners identify their works to OpenAI and control how they are used  —  OpenAI says it's developing a tool to let creators better control how their content is used in AI.

item.title: アマゾン、プライム・ビデオ向けに3つの新しいインタラクティブ広告フォーマットを発表：ショッピング可能なカルーセル広告、インタラクティブな一時停止広告、インタラクティブなブランド・トリビア広告（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Amazon announces three new interactive ad formats for Prime Video: shoppable carousel ads, interactive pause ads, and interactive brand trivia ads  —  Three new formats will let users easily include products featured in ads to their Amazon carts, with no need for QR codes.

item.title: ディズニーのボブ・アイガーCEOは、マーベルは「年に2本程度のTVシリーズ」と「最大3本」の映画をリリースすることで、生産量を減らし、質を重視すると語っている（Jennifer Maas/Variety）
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Disney CEO Bob Iger says Marvel is going to reduce output and focus on quality by releasing “about two TV series a year” and a “maximum of three” films per year  —  Disney CEO Bob Iger says the company is shrinking the MCU with a new mission to drop the number …

item.title: OpenAIがDALL-E 3で作成された画像を検出するツールをリリース、改変されていない画像で98％の精度を謳う、マイクロソフトとアドビのコンテンツ認証グループに参加（Deepa Seetharaman/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Deepa Seetharaman / Wall Street Journal:
OpenAI releases a tool to detect DALL-E 3-created images, claiming 98% accuracy for unaltered images, and joins Microsoft and Adobe's content credentials group  —  Startup's new tool detects 98% of pictures generated by its DALL-E 3 system, but success drops if the images are altered

item.title: ディズニーのストリーミング部門、第2四半期は前年同期比$659Mの赤字から$18Mの赤字に縮小、2024年第4四半期にはストリーミングの黒字化を達成できる見込みと発表（Robbie Whelan/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Robbie Whelan / Wall Street Journal:
Disney's streaming unit reports a loss of $18M in Q2, down from a $659M loss YoY, and says it is on track to achieve streaming profitability in Q4 2024  —  Entertainment giant adds streaming customers as it swings to a loss as a result of charge from India media venture
